```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r data}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)

df <- data.table(Agree=c(93), 
                 Disagree=c(7))

df2 <- df %>% 
        pivot_longer(cols = c("Agree", "Disagree"), names_to = "Vote", values_to = "Percent")
```

```{r plot}
ggplot(df2, aes(x= "", y=Percent, fill = Vote)) + 
            geom_bar(stat="identity", width=1, color="white") +
  coord_polar("y", start=0) +
  theme_void() +
  geom_text(aes(y = Percent, label = paste0(Percent, "%")), color = "black", size=4,
            position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5))+
        labs(title = "How Often Did Kamala Harris Vote with Bernie Sanders in 2017-18",
             caption = "Data: ProPublica | Visualization: @ImmediateFishing8")+
theme(plot.title = element_text(
      hjust = 0.5,
      face = "bold",
      size = 10, 
      color = "black"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(
      hjust = 0.5,
      face = "bold",
      size = 7, 
      color = "black"),
            legend.title = element_blank(),
    plot.caption = element_text(
      hjust = 0.5,
      face = "bold",
      size = 7, 
      color = "black"))
```
